page.title: 20HOUSING
page.content: In Porthleven we did a survey on what kind of houses people live in. We decided that it would be very difficult to do a survey on the whole of Porthleven so we confined it to our school. In our school we have one hundred and thirty one pupils. Forty six live in a semi detached house, twelve in a detached house, thirty eight in a bungalow, one in a semi detached bungalow, four in a flat, twenty eight in terraced houses and two live in cottages in the country. The older houses are found mainly around the harbour and the newer bungalows are on estates on the outskirts of the village. Some of the older houses are over two hundred years old.
